players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Charlie: "Bob is suspicious because he didn't say anything about Diana's death."
Bob: "I'm very sad about Diana's death. I didn't see anything suspicious last night."
Charlie: "I think Bob is lying about not seeing anything suspicious last night. I'm going to kill him tonight."
You: "I think Charlie is lying about being the mafioso. I want to investigate him again tonight."
